customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description: Mute few channels on the sidebar
inline.expectedResult: Muted channels keep their spot within the category, no longer sort to the bottom of their sidebar category (starting in 5.26, phase 2 sidebar)

inline.description: Ensure logged in user has mentions in some muted channels, not all
inline.expectedResult: Muted channel should appear at reduced opacity in the sidebar, including the mention badge

inline.description: Collapse the category with the muted channels
inline.expectedResult:
Verify muted channels without the mentions have been collapsed
Verify muted channels with mentions are not collapsed and are shown with other Unread channels
